description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Try this frantic space shooter with eight action packed levels! Fight against tons of enemy waves to progress in levels. Destroy the Planetoid that contains the bonuses and at last, destroy the core!
description.short: Try this frantic space shooter with eight action packed levels! Fight against tons of enemy waves to progress in levels. Destroy the Planetoid that contains the bonuses and at last, destroy the core!
